text: @NYGovCuomo How you or anyone could think you did a good job handling the coronavirus is truly mind boggling. You smugly said you can’t lock down Ny and 2 Days later you were screaming to lock it down. I need ventilators, I need hospitals, I need everything lol. U were not prepared.
